title: Evil Rose Becomes Love
resume: Her father married a much younger woman, she is a spoiled little brat whose goal is to break them up. But she faces an obstacle, her new stepmother’s brother played by Great Warintorn is there to watch her every move. If she does something hurtful, he is there to protect his sister.
